thread.title: Luxury Lifestyle Vacations Club to Feature Monde Osé Erotic Week Event at Desire Resorts and Spa Riviera Maya on the 24th-29th of November 2015
thread.title_full: Luxury Lifestyle Vacations Club to Feature Monde Osé Erotic Week Event at Desire Resorts and Spa Riviera Maya on the 24th-29th of November 2015

author: prbuzz.com
title: Luxury Lifestyle Vacations Club to Feature Monde Osé Erotic Week Event at Desire Resorts and Spa Riviera Maya on the 24th-29th of November 2015
text:
Luxury Lifestyle Vacations or LLV Club is a full service website offering lifestyle vacation destinations that give every client the ultimate getaway experience they need for an unforgettable retreat. This November 24th to 29th, MondeOsé.com will be presenting this Erotic Week at Desire Resorts & Spa Riviera Maya.
The event will actually be a tantra and erotic arts week presented by popular lifestyle brand Monde Osé in order to promote enjoyment and understanding of life, sensuality and love. The mission is to provide unique and sexy entertainment that seduces the audience, but remains a classy product for everyone. Osé is actually a French word that means “to dare.”
For those who are looking for unique and more sensual travel experience, LLVCLUB.com has been proven to become the leading lifestyle vacations on the web. In fact, they have been serving clients for years now. When it comes to luxury and lifestyle vacations, they efficiently work in order to match their clients’ dream getaway.
At LLV Club, they recognize their clients’ travel needs as their main priority. They also offer longer stays, night touring and overnights for more exciting moments. Travelers have the time to explore the entire place so that they can eat, drink, see and experience whatever they want during their voyage.
With world-class accommodations as well as inclusive amenities, clients take advantage of amazing service and place at the same time. For ultimate comfort, LLV Club continuously provides great adventure in the finest resorts and hotels for a luxuryous lifestyle experience the whole lot in a very tantric atmosphere.
“We dare you to join us at Desire Resort and Spa November 24th to the 29th, 2015 for a unique, sexy, exclusive, and original event,” says LLV Club.
For those looking for an ultimate entertainment with sensual effects, Monde Osé is the perfect destination. In fact, those who have already attended their events know how erotic it is with fun, beautiful, like-minded individuals. People can dare to enjoy, flirt, dance and tease while letting every sense guide the right way for a more enjoyable experience. Book now .
###
For those who are interested in Monde Osé Erotic Week, they may visit http://mondeose.com/tantra-erotic-arts-week-at-desire-resorts-riviera-maya/ or check out http://www.luxury-lifestyle-vacations.com/private_groups1.asp?ID=921 for more details.
